definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: So it’s not hard to see where Eritrea gets its bunker mentality from.
sentences.chinese: 所以不難看出厄立特里亞人好鬥精神的來源了。

sentences.english: In addition, Stamoulis says nearly 75 percent of Eritrea's population is undernourished .
sentences.chinese: 另外，S說，厄立特里亞近75%的人口營養不良。

sentences.english: Eritrea has always been a bit of a hot potato.
sentences.chinese: 厄立特里亞也確實有點像燙手山芋。

sentences.english: Pray for the salvation of the Eritreans as well as the Libyans .
sentences.chinese: 爲利比亞及厄立特里亞人得救禱告。

sentences.english: He was sent to Eritrea to reconnoitre the enemy position.
sentences.chinese: 他被派往厄立特里亞偵察敵軍位置。
